nodes.title: The Signal
nodes.text: A missing researcher sends you one final encrypted message. It will self-delete in 10 minutes.

nodes.title: Abandoned Lab
nodes.text: You enter a dark lab. A terminal asks for an override.

nodes.title: Late Night Call
nodes.text: Your teammate finds an ethical fail-safe hidden in old notes.

nodes.title: Ending: Responsible Breakthrough
nodes.text: You recover the discovery and deploy safeguards. Lives are protected.

nodes.title: Ending: Containment Failure
nodes.text: You move too fast and miss warnings. The system fails publicly.
